transcripts.text: Hello YouTube family.  This is Diana again.  I'm sorry it's taking me so long to update.  I have, just so you know, if you don't see anything here on YouTube or on the community page, I have made all my posts regarding Frank's condition on Facebook public.  So that would be the best place to go if you're wondering or waiting for a video.  Because like I said before, this is totally not my thing.  There's so much good news.  Frank is off the respirator.  He is off the feeding tubes.  And miraculously in under 24 hours...
